All 3 failures are the same issue: NPE on consumer field: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/085cee318d2a57ef598317b2ba1f44678db0f48e/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-scaleout/spark/dl4j-spark-parameterserver/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/spark/parameterserver/pw/SharedTrainingWrapper.java#L475>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/085cee318d2a57ef598317b2ba1f44678db0f48e/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-scaleout/spark/dl4j-spark-parameterserver/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/spark/parameterserver/pw/SharedTrainingWrapper.java#L475</denchmark-link>
Could just be anomaly of single-machine execution for test, however...

comments.comment: Closing in favor of this issue: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/7602>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/7602</denchmark-link>
